malay: bapa;ayah;ayahanda;abah;pasangan kepada ibu;orang lelaki yang sudah mempunyai anak

english_sentence: "When we were little, electricity was still not available. At that time, only the light of the oil lamp illuminated the house. We were doing our homework using only the light from the lamp. It is much easier for you (guys) now, but you are still lazy to study," Bah Ngah said to his grandchildren.

malay_sentence: “Jangan potong seperti itu, nanti lambat masak,” kata ibu.
english_sentence: “Do not cut like that, it will take longer to cook,” said mother.

semai_sentence: Wak Maira ajeh rajet kitulog iamek beh kerjak deg.
malay_sentence: Wak Maira rajin tolong ibunya buat kerja rumah.
english_sentence: Wak Maira diligently helped her mother with housework.

semai_sentence: Bah Wan ubai betedeh ku deg rak mase jis manik.
malay_sentence: Bah Wan berteduh di rumah lama yang ditinggalkan ketika hujan.
english_sentence: Bah Wan took shelter in an old abandoned house during rain.

semai_sentence: Mabek sanget keral manah entem naigemar kek tabeg.
malay_sentence: Budak lelaki pada zaman dulu suka mencari katak.
english_sentence: Boys in the old days liked to search for frogs.

semai_sentence: Mong tacik ku beg teu tengah kikurek paser.
malay_sentence: Ada jentera pengorek di tepi sungai mengorek pasir.
english_sentence: There is an excavator by the river digging sand.

semai_sentence: Bah Kulop ya kitageh ngut teu bel.
malay_sentence: Bah Kulop sudah ketagih minum arak.
english_sentence: Bah Kulop is addicted to alcohol.

semai_sentence: Ya nutahut tenek eng pek kijog nu kampug.
malay_sentence: Sudah setahun kakak saya tak balik kampung.
english_sentence: It’s been a year since my sister went back to the village.

semai_sentence: Apak eng kicis cahuk isabet atajap.
malay_sentence: Bapa saya mengasah sabit hingga tajam.
english_sentence: My father sharpened the sickle until it was sharp.

semai_sentence: Eng iude ku kateh beradek eng.
malay_sentence: Saya anak ke-empat dalam keluarga.
english_sentence: I am the fourth child in my family.

semai_sentence: Agame Islam ajeh suok bagi sengoi ku kampug jik.
malay_sentence: Agama Islam adalah pegangan utama orang kampung ini.
english_sentence: Islam is the main religion of the people in this village.

semai_sentence: Bah Wan kiuker imuh ku keneng jehuk mase jitengroj.
malay_sentence: Bah Wan mengukir namanya di batang pokok semasa memancing.
english_sentence: Bah Wan carved his name on the tree trunk while fishing.

semai_sentence: Lekat ngmain umbak ku pantei, jik jirasa serunuk.
malay_sentence: Kami bermain ombak di pantai, terasa seronok.
english_sentence: We played with the waves at the beach, it was fun.

semai_sentence: Bah Sali kigemar leklog baju ungngu.
malay_sentence: Bah Sali suka memakai baju ungu.
english_sentence: Bah Sali likes to wear purple clothes.

semai_sentence: Solat ajeh wajeb bagi sengoi Islam.
malay_sentence: Solat adalah kewajiban bagi orang Islam.
english_sentence: Prayer is compulsory for Muslims.

semai_sentence: Wak eng pai kibegensir ru mai ju Ulu Kampar.
malay_sentence: Makcik saya baru berkahwin dengan orang Ulu Kampar.
english_sentence: My aunt just got married to a man from Ulu Kampar.

semai_sentence: Rumah bujang ajeh walah wal, medei tiap ari de makan ku kedai.
malay_sentence: Rumah bujang itu tiada dapur, jadi mereka makan di kedai.
english_sentence: The bachelors’ home had no stove, so they ate at restaurants.

semai_sentence: Eng kineng ular sawa ku was bunga raya.
malay_sentence: Saya nampak ular sawa di kawasan bunga raya.
english_sentence: I saw a python in the hibiscus area.

semai_sentence: Bah Jali kiweg dawei jadi penyangkut baju.
malay_sentence: Bah Jali membengkokkan dawai untuk buat penyangkut baju.
english_sentence: Bah Jali bent a wire to make a hanger.

semai_sentence: Wak Nani pek kiyaken buleh kilulos ujian lesen memandu.
malay_sentence: Wak Nani tidak yakin boleh lulus lesen memandu.
english_sentence: Wak Nani was not confident she could pass the driving test.

semai_sentence: Cekgu kitanya nu Bah Deran, "Yama hek pek hahol nu sekulah kelemnek?"
malay_sentence: Cikgu tanya Bah Deran, "Kenapa awak tak datang sekolah semalam?"
english_sentence: The teacher asked Bah Deran, "Why didn’t you come to school yesterday?"

semai_sentence: Amek kiurok, "Yap nu eng, bok de cereh pasu bunga eng?"
malay_sentence: Ibu berkata, "Beritahu saya, siapa pecahkan pasu bunga saya?"
english_sentence: Mother said, "Tell me, who broke my flower pot?"

semai_sentence: Mai yek ajeh kimengamok sampei kek kiterok …
malay_sentence: Orang gila itu mengamuk mengejar orang kampung.
english_sentence: The insane man went on a rampage chasing villagers.

semai_sentence: Bah Ajis kiyog ju imutu kelem jihnek …
malay_sentence: Bah Ajis jatuh dari motosikal sebab langgar anjing.
english_sentence: Bah Ajis fell from his motorbike because he hit a dog.

semai_sentence: Bah kain nu ada batu zamrud.
malay_sentence: Kalung itu ada batu zamrud.
english_sentence: The necklace has an emerald.

semai_sentence: Zinah tai ngeng hukom adat.
malay_sentence: Zina dilarang oleh hukum adat.
english_sentence: Adultery is forbidden by customary law.

semai_sentence: Anak-anak suka nengok zirafah nu zu.
malay_sentence: Kanak-kanak suka tengok zirafah di zoo.
english_sentence: Children like to see giraffes at the zoo.

semai_sentence: Mase cuti sekulah, eng ru peringak eng jiet melawat nu zu.
malay_sentence: Semasa cuti sekolah, saya dan keluarga pergi melawat ke zoo.
english_sentence: During school holidays, my family and I went to visit the zoo.
